name: Narcotics
uniques: Can only be created by Mercantile City-States

civilopediaText.text: Hard drugs, the kind that causes long-lasting addictions and intense chemical imbalance in long-term users.

name: Hexlock Chemicals
uniques: Can only be created by Mercantile City-States

civilopediaText.text: Various chemical mixtures only the Hexlock is able to make. Combined with other strategic resources, they can make artificial Great Units.
